item.title: What to know about the proposed Israel-Hamas Gaza ceasefire and next steps
item.description: Last month, President Donald Trump proposed a 20-point plan for a ceasefire in the Gaza Strip ahead of this week's negotiations in Egypt.

item.title: Trump draws international praise as broker of Israel-Hamas deal
item.description: Israeli President Isaac Herzog thanked Trump "for his incredible leadership."

item.title: WATCH: Monarch butterfly gets wing transplant, continues migration
item.description: An injured monarch butterfly was able to continue its migration after undergoing a wing transplant at a nature preserve in New York.
